channel.title: "The Crucible" Help with questions from the play
channel.description:
ok guys, I kinda fell asleep listening to the teacher read the play... Went to a party the night before :D If anyone has read the play or heard it and can answetr these questions or give alittle input I would realy appreciate it. I have a test tomarrow :(
1)[code]As act 4 begins, how does Hale spend his time?[code] 2)[code]What is the problem with the cows?[/code] 3)[code]What crimes does Abigail commit against Parris,"her uncle?What happends to Abigail and to Mercy Lewis?[/code] 4)[code]Why does Dansforth allow the Pronctors to meet before Mr. Pronctors Execution?[/code] 5)[code]Why does Giles Cory die?[/code][/code][/code]
